TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SymWriter extends System.Diagnostics.SymbolStore.SymWriterBase implements class System.Diagnostics.SymbolStore.ISymbolWriter, class System.IDisposable
Public Class SymWriter Inherits SymWriterBase Implements IDisposable, ISymbolWriter
type SymWriter = class inherit SymWriterBase interface ISymbolWriter interface IDisposable

Docs.summary: Represents a symbol writer for managed code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks <xref:System.Diagnostics.SymbolStore.SymWriter>類別會提供定義文件，序列點、 語彙範圍和變數的方法。

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void DefineLocalVariable(string name, valuetype System.Reflection.FieldAttributes attributes, unsigned int8[] signature, valuetype System.Diagnostics.SymbolStore.SymAddressKind addrKind, int32 addr1, int32 addr2, int32 addr3, int32 startOffset, int32 endOffset) cil managed

Public Overridable Sub DefineLocalVariable (name As String, attributes As FieldAttributes, signature As Byte(), addrKind As SymAddressKind, addr1 As Integer, addr2 As Integer, addr3 As Integer, startOffset As Integer, endOffset As Integer)

public: virtual void DefineLocalVariable(System::String ^ name, System::Reflection::FieldAttributes attributes, cli::array <System::Byte> ^ signature, System::Diagnostics::SymbolStore::SymAddressKind addrKind, int addr1, int addr2, int addr3, int startOffset, int endOffset);

abstract member DefineLocalVariable : string * System.Reflection.FieldAttributes * byte[] * System.Diagnostics.SymbolStore.SymAddressKind * int * int * int * int * int -> unit override this.DefineLocalVariable : string * System.Reflection.FieldAttributes * byte[] * System.Diagnostics.SymbolStore.SymAddressKind * int * int * int * int * int -> unit
MemberSignature.Usage: symWriter.DefineLocalVariable (name, attributes, signature, addrKind, addr1, addr2, addr3, startOffset, endOffset)

Docs.param: The local variable name.
The local variable attributes specified using the enumerator.
The local variable signature.
The address types for addr1, addr2, and addr3 using .
The first address for the local variable specification.
The second address for the local variable specification.
The third address for the local variable specification.
The start offset for the variable. If zero, this parameter is ignored and the variable is defined throughout the entire scope. If nonzero, it falls within the offsets of the current scope.
The end offset for the variable. If zero, this parameter is ignored and the variable is defined throughout the entire scope. If nonzero, it falls within the offsets of the current scope.
Docs.summary: Defines a single variable in the current lexical scope.

remarks.format:
## Remarks `startOffset`和`endOffset`參數是選擇性的。 如果其值為零，則會予以忽略，並會在整個範圍中定義變數。 如果其值為非零，其會落在目前的範圍的位移。
您可以呼叫<xref:System.Diagnostics.SymbolStore.SymWriter.DefineLocalVariable%2A>多次的不同範圍的位移範圍中出現多個相同名稱的變數。 （在此情況下，開始和結束位移不能重疊。）

Docs.param: The document object for which the sequence points are being defined.
The IL offset of the sequence points measured from the beginning of the method.
The starting line numbers of the sequence points.
The starting column numbers of the sequence points.
The ending line numbers of the sequence points.
The ending column numbers of the sequence points.
Docs.summary: Defines a group of sequence points within the current method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 序列點用來對應原始程式檔位置與 IL 位移。 每個序列點 IL 位移和來源檔案指定的區域，相對的開始和結束行/資料行數字所組成<xref:System.Diagnostics.SymbolStore.ISymbolDocument>物件。 位於指定索引的每個陣列的每個項目會對應至特定的序列點。 每一行和每個資料行定義方法內的陳述式的開始。 應該排序陣列的位移遞增的順序。 此位移為一律從方法，以位元組為單位的起始位移。

Docs.summary: Releases unmanaged resources and performs other cleanup operations before the is reclaimed by garbage collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會覆寫<xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>。 應用程式程式碼不應該呼叫這個方法。物件的`Finalize`方法會自動叫用記憶體回收期間，除非已停用記憶體回收行程的最終處理的呼叫所<xref:System.GC.SuppressFinalize%2A>方法。

Docs.param: The metadata emitter interface.

The file name for which the debugging symbols are written. Some writers require a file name, while others do not. If a file name is specified for a writer that does not use file names, this parameter is ignored.
indicates that this is a full rebuild; indicates an incremental compilation.
Docs.summary: Sets the metadata emitter interface to associate with this writer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks <xref:System.Diagnostics.SymbolStore.ISymbolWriter.Initialize%2A> 也會設定輸出檔名稱的偵錯符號寫入的位置。 這個方法可以呼叫一次，必須在呼叫任何其他寫入器方法會呼叫之前。

Docs.permission: 提供存取 unmanaged 程式碼的能力。

Docs.param: The metadata token for the method to be opened.
Docs.summary: Opens a method in which to place symbol information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指定的方法會變成目前的方法呼叫來定義序列點、 參數和語彙範圍。 沒有隱含的語彙範圍整個方法。 重新開啟先前未關閉的方法，會清除任何先前定義的符號的方法。

Docs.param: The name of the new namespace.
Docs.summary: Opens a new namespace.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 定義在命名空間中存在的方法或變數之前呼叫這個方法。 可以是巢狀命名空間。

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual int OpenScope (int startOffset);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance int32 OpenScope(int32 startOffset) cil managed
Public Overridable Function OpenScope (startOffset As Integer) As Integer
public: virtual int OpenScope(int startOffset);
abstract member OpenScope : int -> int override this.OpenScope : int -> int

Docs.param: The IL offset in bytes from the beginning of the method to the first instruction in the lexical scope.
Docs.summary: Opens a new lexical scope in the current method.
Docs.returns: An opaque scope identifier that can be used with to define the start and end offsets of a scope at a later time. In this case, the offsets passed to and are ignored. A scope identifier is valid only in the current method.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 這個範圍會變成新的目前範圍，並且推送至堆疊的範圍。 範圍必須形成階層。 同層級不允許重疊。
範圍識別項，才有效目前方法中。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 基礎[ISymUnmanagedWriter 介面](~/docs/framework/unmanaged-api/diagnostics/isymunmanagedwriter-interface.md)(對應的 unmanaged 應用程式開發介面) 介面代表 managed 程式碼的符號寫入器。 介面會提供方法來定義文件，序列點、 語彙範圍和變數。

Docs.permission: 提供存取 unmanaged 程式碼的能力。

Docs.summary: Identifies the user-defined method as the entry point for the current module.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這通常是主要的方法。

Docs.param: The fully qualified name of the namespace.
Docs.summary: Specifies that the given, fully qualified namespace name is used within the open lexical scope.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 關閉目前的範圍，可防止這個範圍內使用命名空間。 命名空間中保持使用中的所有領域都繼承自目前開啟的範圍。
